entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 03 May 2016
